title: Long Haired Country Boy (feat. The Rockin' CJB)
lyrics:
People say I ain't no good
And I'm crazy as a loon
'Cause I get stoned in the morning
I get drunk in the afternoon
I'm kinda like my old blue tick hound
I like to lay around in the shade

And I ain't got no money

But I damn sure got it made



And I ain't asking nobody for nothin'

If I can't get it on my own

If you don't like the way I'm livin'

Just leave this long haired country boy alone



Well I've seen a preacher man talking on TV

He was puttin' down the rock and roll

He wants me to send a donation

'Cause he's worried about my soul

He said Jesus walked on the water

And y'all know this is true

But sometimes I think that old preacher man

Would sure like to do a little walking too



'Cause I ain't asking nobody for nothin'

If I can't get it on my own

If you don't like the way I'm livin'

Just leave this long haired country boy alone



I said, the poor girl wants to marry

And the rich girl wants to flirt

The rich boys went off to college

And all of us poor boys came to work

The drunkard wants another drink of wine

And the politician wants your vote

But me, I don't want much of nothin' at all

But I will take another toke



'Cause I ain't asking nobody for nothin'

If I can't get it on my own

If you don't like the way I'm livin'

Just leave this long haired country boy alone

If you don't like how I'm livin'

Just leave this long haired country boy alone
